title: Yahoo Lifestyle
text: A review of your journal or notes from your past could be rather enlightening today. Often, it takes years to learn some lessons because you fail to reexamine previous realizations. You can end up repeating the same patterns without making the essential connections. However, youre more likely to bridge gaps in your understanding now by revisiting your own thinking on an issue. A difficult yet emotionally rich experience may be the necessary catalyst. You only need to heed your own words of wisdom to make sense of what seemed nonsensical at first. Actor Jess Conrad said, Learn the past, watch the present, and create the future. Get Your Complete Cosmic Profile
